# UIMenuElement.State.mixed

**Case**

A constant indicating the menu element is in the “mixed” state.

## Declaration

```swift
case mixed
```

## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuElement/State/mixed] state is one that’s neither “on” or “off”. The menu system displays a mixed-mark, such as a checkmark or hyphen, next to the menu element.

## States

- **UIMenuElement.State.off**: A constant indicating the menu element is in the “off” state.
- **UIMenuElement.State.on**: A constant indicating the menu element is in the “on” state.

items.description: A constant indicating the menu element is in the “off” state.
items.name: UIMenuElement.State.off

items.description: A constant indicating the menu element is in the “on” state.
